Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Pn-Imn with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced features, a collar and crossed hands in relief with bracelets holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Condition: fair - cracked at neck, waist and ankle level
